Description: Fragment of papyrus, with remains of Coptic text on both sides. One side has 13 lines written against the fibres, while the other has 7 lines on its left half written along the fibres. Mounted with EA 75433.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (380657) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/380657)
